title: Weaponizing Disinformation: Kara Swisher and Joshua Johnson
description: "Alternative facts," "fake news," gaslighting," "conspiracy theory," are all terms that get thrown around a lot in our politics nowadays. How do we determine what's real versus what is really fake and how can the press and tech companies fix the problem?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: "Alternative facts," "fake news," gaslighting," "conspiracy theory," are all terms that get thrown around a lot in our politics nowadays. How do we determine what's real versus what is really fake and how can the press and tech companies fix the problem?
itunes:title: Weaponizing Disinformation: Kara Swisher and Joshua Johnson
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: How do we determine what is real or fake in an era of weaponizing falsehoods for political gain?
